name: css-text-transform
description: Css module of single purpose classes for text transform

scripts.start: tachyons src/css-text-transform.css > css/css-text-transform.css && tachyons src/css-text-transform.css --minify > css/css-text-transform.min.css && tachyons src/css-text-transform.css --generate-docs --package=../../package.json > readme.md
